description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal (CWE-22) as it uses user-supplied input in 'this.request.path' to construct a file path without properly validating or sanitizing the input. This could allow an attacker to access arbitrary files on the system. Additionally, the function does not perform any input validation (CWE-20) on 'this.request.path', which could lead to other potential vulnerabilities.
